content:
Release of APD-DK expected ultimo week 17
The 2.0.1 release will have appointment requester and location type "DST" for an appointment that is outside health care facilities locations and not at citizens own home. All Erratas will be included as well.

The release of the APD-DK 2.0.1 is expected next week but the draft version that I expected be released with minor changes will be fount here:http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/drafts/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Dokumentation/APD-DK-v2.0.1.docx

Well - the release of the APD-DK 2.0.1 is postponed and the draft version will be changes regarding the documentationOf service events. That is, the APD-DK is expected to be released with minor changes in the CDA body and moderate changes in the CDA header part

The APD-DK 2.0.1 standard Is not released. Please check out https://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/HL7/Appointment/Dokumentation/APD-DK-v2.0.1.pdf
The released version has compared to the draft version from April 24 added the possibility to enter a time concept like "morning" instead of for instance showing 7-9
